listing.listing_description:
With unbeatable views of the crystal-clear ocean and sophisticated European-style furnishings, Villa Sublime truly lives up to its name. Located on the south coast of Providenciales near Silly Creek, the property has three bedrooms, with the option of a fourth, and plenty of space for up to six guests to spread out. Sunbathe around the pool or slip into the ocean via the villa’s unique grotto.

Not only is Villa Sublime itself quite spacious, but its 1.5 acres of land afford stunning views of Silly Creek and sunsets over Turtle Rock. Start each day with breakfast at the covered outdoor dining area, then soak in the sunshine from the pool terrace or take the path down to the ocean for a swim. Inside, the villa has central air conditioning and other perks.

Villa Sublime’s living spaces mix traditional Caribbean pieces with European touches for one-of-a-kind style. In the living room, white walls, slipcovered sofas and wicker armchairs feel cool and tropical, while a Persian-style rug, antique armoire, columns and wrought-iron accents add a sense of history. The dining room, which is open to the kitchen, has an elegant wrought-iron and glass table plus an ocean view, and the kitchen itself has fresh-feeling white cabinets and stone countertops.

Each of the property’s three bedrooms has air conditioning, a ceiling fan, a television and a DVD player. There is one bedroom with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, one bedroom with a queen bedroom and en-suite bathroom and one bedroom with a queen bed and adjacent bathroom. Larger parties can use the den, which has two twin sleeper sofas, as a fourth bedroom.

Swimming in the turquoise Turks and Caicos waters is at your doorstep at Villa Sublime, but the beach is just a short drive away, too. It’s also 15 minutes by car to downtown Providenciales and its shopping, restaurants and resorts, as well as the international airport.

Copyright © 2014 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located in the fabulous Grace Bay area of the Turks and Caicos, Villa Islander comes together in a symphony of cool greys and copious natural wood. Just a two minute walk from the white sands at Coral Garden Beach, which is part of Princess Alexandra National Park, this stunning vacation rental is situated in perhaps the most picturesque area of this Caribbean island. Get the holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!

The striking grounds at Villa Islander feature an L-shaped swimming pool, a reflecting pool, alfresco dining, a gas barbeque and an alfresco shower. With plenty of sun loungers, a rooftop terrace, beach chairs, parasols and outdoor speakers, the party can get bumping in no time. Interior perks include a wine fridge, Smart Television, sound system and Wi-Fi. There’s also a study in case you need to stay on top of work while away. Your reservation includes complimentary housekeeping and security. Chef, massage, babysitting and pre-stocking services can be booked at an additional cost.

The floor plan of Villa Islander is spacious and optimizes seamless indoor/outdoor living. The furnishings are comfortable and contemporary. Cool off in the living area with a good book and an even better glass of wine. The adjacent dining area includes a glass top table and retro lighting. The fully equipped kitchen provides a center island with gas hobs.

Four phenomenal bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. Each bedroom features a king sized bed, en-suite bathroom, rain shower and terrace access. The master suite also includes a dual vanity and a bidet. Two suites are located in the main house, and two suites are in the guest house. The layout facilitates gentle oscillations between private time and socializing. This villa makes a great bet for a family getaway or a special event like a wedding or birthday.

Grace Bay has been awarded TripAdvisor’s coveted ‘Traveler’s Choice’ award for the top quality of its soft sands and clear waters. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling, scuba diving and golf. Or try a scooter tour for a change of pace, possibly the best way to see a sunny island that’s only a few miles across. Nature lovers should also be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas. Live it up in Turks and Caicos!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated amongst the Aldea Zama neighbourhood’s luscious jungle greenery, Villa Verde is just minutes from town, the Tulum Ruins, and breathtaking cenotes. This four bedroom luxury rental is located close to the action, while maintaining unsurpassed privacy. Perfect for a family vacation or a Mexican getaway with friends, this area of the Mayan Riviera is rich with beautiful landscapes, exciting nightlife, and astonishing historical sights.

Designed to embrace its tropical surroundings, Villa Verde delightfully blurs the line between inside and out. The open concept living/dining/kitchen space features a floor-to-ceiling opening, stretching its entire length. Exposed wood beams and intricate stone work set a charming rustic tone, mixed with modern furniture, lighting fixtures, and high-end appliances, Verde is tropical elegance at its finest.

Outside on the terrace, guests will love the private atmosphere created by the natural surroundings. The swimming pool is a great place to cool off in the afternoon. After your swim, head up to the rooftop patio to work on your tan from one of the hammocks. At meal time, there’s space for eight in the formal dining area and lots of seating outside, should you choose to dine alfresco.

All four of Villa Verde’s bedrooms feature king sized beds and en-suite bathrooms. The ground floor bedroom has direct access to the pool and an alfresco bath tub. There are three bedrooms on the first floor, one of which has a separate entrance, kitchenette, and private balcony.

When it’s time to get out and do some exploring, the Tulum ruins are a great place to start. After that, check out El Gran Cenote, Tulum’s most popular section of cavernous underground waterways. With ample wood decking and multiple entrance points, it’s the perfect introduction to this natural phenomenon. And, no Mexican vacation is complete without a trip to the beach. Just ten minutes away, the beautifully sandy shores of Tulum beach await.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With accommodations for twenty-two and an incredible amount of luxurious indoor/outdoor spaces, Casa Koko is perfect for a large scale family vacation, golf trip with friends, or corporate retreat. All nine bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, lounge areas are designed with space for the whole group in mind, and there are several well crafted little nooks to easily find privacy when desired. And, Koko’s views of the ocean, mountains, and golf course are unparalleled.

Koko is located on the Punta Mita Peninsula at the same latitude as the Hawaiian islands, so you can expect near perfect weather all year. Taking that into consideration, architects designed Koko to merge seamlessly from inside to out, with numerous windows and openings to promote the flow of fresh ocean breeze, natural sunlight, and relaxed vacationers. Raw, exposed wood and stone are the structural components, while hay roofing and lush palm trees provide shade and protection. There are several lounge spaces inside, decorated with designer furniture, stained wood, and neutral, relaxing textures. The fully equipped kitchen comes with a chef, waiter, and bartender to take care of your group. And, there’s also a state of the art fitness room, media room, and spa.

At meal times there are several options. Both inside and outside have a space suitable for eighteen guests, as well as a fourteen person breakfast lounge, and numerous smaller settings surrounding the main areas. On the terrace, guests will love the infinity pool and hot tub, sun loungers, sand terrace fire pit, hammocks, and amazing ocean view. There are also three housekeepers on site and shuttle service to help make your stay even more comfortable.

Take a ten minute drive using the two, supplied, golf carts and you’ll find tennis courts, golf courses, and three beach clubs, all within the resort’s gated property. For some off-resort exploration, Puerto Vallarta is about an hour drive down the coast.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With three natural reefs just off the shore from this oceanfront property, Three Cays Villa is a snorkeler’s paradise. Located on Turtle Tail on Providenciales, the four-bedroom villa has ocean access for guests who’ve brought their masks and flippers, plus a swimming pool and spacious terrace for those who’d rather stay on land. With a guest cottage, this Mediterranean-style home offers an unforgettable experience inside and out.

Step through the villa’s gates into lush, landscaped gardens and continue to the 150 feet of ocean frontage. Enjoy sea views from the private pool, surrounding patio, or al-fresco dining area, complete with outdoor grill. There’s also a shaded outdoor dining area and covered sitting area if you need shelter from the tropical sun. In the evenings, satellite television, Wi-Fi access and air conditioning provide entertainment and comfort.

There’s room for everyone to relax in Three Cays Villa’s large, open living room. A cathedral ceiling topped with a fan keeps things cool and breezy, plenty of wicker seating is casual and inviting and sand-colored cushions are a reminder you’re at the beach. Gather around the long table in the dining room for family meals with a picture-window view of the sea, or around the spacious breakfast bar in the gourmet kitchen for a look at the ocean with your morning coffee.

There are three bedrooms in the main house, and one in the poolside guest cottage. All four bedrooms have air conditioning and ceiling fans. In the main house, the master bedroom has a king bed, en-suite bathroom with jetted tub and a television. There’s also one bedroom with two twin beds and one bedroom with a queen bed that share a bathroom. The guest cottage has a queen bed, en-suite bathroom flat-screen television and a mini fridge.

You can swim and snorkel right from Three Cays Villa, but if you want to walk in the sand, the famed stretches of Grace Bay Beach are just a 15-minute drive away. It’s a 10-minute drive to the grocery store, and 15 minutes by car to restaurants, a tennis court, a gym and a clinic. The airport is a 20-minute drive away, and the golf course and downtown area are both a 25-minute drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This spectacular architect-designed property, completed in 2012, is one of the most contemporary villas in Barbados. Set on half an acre of tropical gardens, and with room for up to eight guests, this gated property is a fabulous place to unwind and enjoy a memorable Caribbean holiday.

Atelier House sits on a ridge above the West Coast of Barbados, and the views across the treetops to the sea are spectacular – especially from the infinity pool or the panoramic roof terrace. This being the west coast, the sunset views are magical – enjoy a glass of rum punch as you watch the sun disappear over the horizon. When you’re not gazing out to sea, you’ll love the other outdoor spaces – perfect for sunbathing, dining, or simply sitting back with a good read.

Indoors, the dramatic double-height living area makes the most of the location, facing out across the pool area to the sea. There is great attention to detail everywhere you look, the sense of light and space accentuated by cool, simple furnishings and surfaces – such as the limestone countertops in the kitchen. As with many of our villas in Barbados, cook service is included, six days a week.

The sophisticated style continues in the four bedrooms, two of which have ensuite bathrooms. The upstairs master bedroom comes with its own balcony for stunning sunset views. The downstairs ensuite bathroom extends to an outdoor shower area.

The nearest West Coast beaches are just a 5-minute drive away, with sparkling waters and powdery white sands – everything you could wish for from a tropical paradise. If you’re not content to sit back and take it easy, there’s a wide range of watersports, golf and dining options, all within easy reach of our villas in Barbados.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that there is construction near the villa. Villa Agua Clara will experience noise, depending on what work is being done at the time. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Experience the ultimate in indoor-outdoor living within walking distance of the beach at Villa Agua Clara. Nestled into the jungle near Santa Teresa, this unparalleled Costa Rica vacation rental is designed to feel like an organic part of its surroundings. Its relaxed vibe and three bedrooms are perfect for a family holiday, a beach getaway with friends or a honeymoon away from it all.

The villa is laid out around a courtyard with a private pool and al-fresco shower where you can while away sunny days or rinse off beach sand; both gas and charcoal barbecues are available upon request if you want to linger outdoors over dinner. Let birdsong be the soundtrack to your stay, or listen to a favorite playlist via the Bluetooth speaker or Wi-Fi.

Sleek furnishings and plenty of natural textures give the open-sided living areas an air of casual chic, while features like LED lighting make the residence eco-friendly. Both the living and dining areas face the pool, as does the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Villa Agua Clara has two bedrooms with king beds, sofa beds and lounge areas, including the master suite, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, ceiling fans and air conditioning, and, like the main living areas, an easy mix of modern lines and organic materials.

Perhaps the best part of this luxury property is its proximity to the beach; the clear blue waters of popular Playa Hermosa are just a 2-minute walk from the villa down a winding path. It’s also just a short drive from the nearest grocery store, the world-class surf break at Playa Santa Teresa and the up-and-coming beach town of Santa Teresa, whose laid-back restaurants are well worth a visit.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Just up the coast from Cabo San Lucas, Villa Jacqueline sits on the ocean facing hillside of San Jose Del Cabo. Jacqueline’s property is part of a small sea side community, interwoven with holes from the Puerto Los Cabos Golf Course, overlooking the Sea of Cortez. With accommodations for ten and a floor plan perfect for hosting, Villa Jacqueline is ideal for a family vacation, golf trip with friends, or a small corporate retreat.

Jacqueline’s interior is extremely spacious. The living room faces a wall length opening to the covered terrace, which is home to a wet bar, alfresco dining, and plenty of outdoor furniture, making it more like a second living room. The decor is simple in a sophisticated way. It’s neutral and relaxing, while conveying a semi-formal elegance. And, with such wide openings to the terrace, the ocean view, ocean breeze, and natural sunlight fill Jacqueline’s interior with ease. Moving into the kitchen, you’ll instantly fall in love with the shear amount of workspace. Granite countertops, a breakfast bar, and an island provide all the space you’ll need, and more. High-end stainless steel appliances and stained wood cabinetry complete the rest of the kitchen’s highly functional environment.

Outside, not one, but two, swimming pools await you. The larger infinity pool is perfect for family and group fun, while the lap pool keeps the focus on the workout. And, after the workout, or just because, there’s a relaxing hot tub as well. There’s also an outdoor fire pit and barbecue on the terrace, perfect for grilling up something fresh from a local market.

For beach access, take a short walk towards the coast and enjoy Fundadores Private Beach Club. Follow Fundadores’ white sand up to their beachfront bar and restaurant for some deliciously fresh sea food, or a casual drink while you enjoy the ocean view.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The name says it all at Crystal Waters. An incredible beachfront vacation rental at Rum Point on Grand Cayman, this gorgeous villa has everything: views, location and luxury amenities. Its 5,200 square feet and five bedrooms are perfect for a breezy holiday with family or a milestone birthday celebration with up to twelve friends.

The best part of the villa might just be the soft sands and clear waters that spread out in front of it. But running a close second are its private pool and outdoor living areas with plenty of loungers, a barbecue and al-fresco dining for ten. When you’re worn out from playing in the water, relax in front of a flat-screen TV, put a favorite playlist on the Bluetooth sound system or share photos of your Cayman Islands trip via Wi-Fi.

Nearly wall-to-wall windows are the only thing separating the villa’s great room from its namesake waters. The open-concept space is expansive and welcoming, with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen. (Be sure to heed the sign designating this a No Texting Zone.) There’s also a separate TV lounge area.

Crystal Waters has one honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, private terrace and al-fresco shower. There are two bedrooms with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, and two bedrooms with queen beds that share a bathroom.

The villa’s location on a 200-foot-wide stretch of beach means that you only need to step outside for the full tropical-island experience. Provided kayaks make it easy to get out and explore the bay. But for those seeking more, it’s just a short walk from the Kaibo Yacht Club, which offers everything from coffee to takeout pizza, and a 10-minute walk from the Rum Point Club.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

listing.listing_description:
Escape to stunning views and modern luxury at Turtle Ridge Villa. Set just above the turquoise waters of Grace Bay, with windows that perfectly frame the horizon, this Turks and Caicos vacation rental will have you constantly reaching for your camera. Use the villa’s well-appointed spaces to entertain or as a base to explore nearby beaches, restaurants, shops and bars.

Drive through the villa’s gates and onto resort-style landscaped grounds. You’ll only need to step up to the entrance to see through the central hall to the ocean beyond, but you’ll want to step out onto the private terrace with an infinity pool, loungers and daybeds, and sitting and dining areas. A covered outdoor kitchen with a barbecue and ice maker makes it easy to serve up both meals and refreshments.

Retractable glass walls lead from the terrace to the great room at Turtle Ridge Villa, allowing you to create one large indoor-outdoor living space. In the sitting and dining areas, furnishings in creams and blues echo the colors of the island’s famed white-sand beaches, while dark wood and pale stone floors create a classic high-contrast Caribbean look. The fully equipped kitchen is a dream for both cooks and diners, with gourmet appliances, a wine fridge and a breakfast bar.

The villa’s three bedrooms are enough to host up to six friends and family members—or even just a party of two on a decadent honeymoon. All three have king beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning, making a holiday here just as comfortable as one at a resort or hotel.

Turtle Ridge Villa is less than a 5-minute walk from gorgeous Grace Bay Beach—frequently named one of the world’s best for its white sands and clear water. From there, continue on to the unique landscape of Princess Alexandra National Park, or to the oceanfront restaurants and shops at the resorts lining Grace Bay. It’s also a short drive from the villa to the local tennis courts, golf club, marina and, when it’s time to leave, the airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Waves overlooks Shoal Bay along the north shore of Anguilla, perched on a lofty headland about five minutes from the beach. Enjoying panoramic views of the coastline and sea, the superbly designed home features an ample private swimming pool, high-end amenities for cooking and entertainment, and beautiful living and dining areas both indoors and alfresco. Three ample bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms accommodate six travelers, ideal for families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests. Your vacation rental at Villa Waves includes a property manager and daily housekeeping service, and numerous other deluxe services are available.

The villa blends a modern sensibility with a vintage Caribbean elegance, featuring glowing white surfaces, rich accents of natural wood, and ample outdoor living areas for savoring the sea-kissed breeze. Refresh yourself with a dip in the swimming pool, and bathe in the sun on lounge chairs overlooking the vast horizon. Dine alfresco in the cool shade of the pergola, and relax in the outdoor living room during the sublime sunset hour.

The spacious interior living room features glass doors opening to the pool terrace. Wide thresholds lead into the ample, open-concept kitchen and dining room, with an exquisite table for eight and lovely lounge areas set beneath high wood ceilings. The kitchen is fully equipped for the contemporary gourmet, with top-of-the-line appliances, a wine fridge, a drink prep area, and a breakfast bar.

The master suite enjoys a privileged, corner position, with expansive ocean views from its king bed and pergola-shaded terrace. Its deluxe ensuite bathroom includes a dual vanity, shower, and tub. Each of the guest suites features a queen bed and ensuite bathroom. One opens directly to the pool, opposite the master suite, with lovely ocean views through glass French windows. There is air conditioning in the bedrooms and living room.

Villa Waves is a short drive from Shoal Bay Beach as well as Valley (the island's capital city), and about fourteen kilometers from CuisinArt Resort Golf Course, home to a fabulous Greg Norman-designed golf course. The international airport is about six kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Make the most of your Caribbean holiday at Afimi. Not only is this Montego Bay vacation rental just 10 minutes from the airport, it boasts a full staff and a postcard-worthy location on a calm lagoon. Spend less time traveling, and more time enjoying the company of friends or family under the Jamaican sun.

Your holiday at Afimi includes the services of a full-time cook, butler, housekeeper and gardener; airport transfers can also be arranged through the villa’s driver. Thanks to its location in the exclusive Lagoons gated community, guests are welcome at the shared pool, tennis courts and fitness center. Of course, the villa also has its own resort-worthy outdoor living areas with space for lounging and dining, a barbecue and al-fresco bar, an infinity pool overlooking the private beach, and snorkeling equipment, sailboats and kayaks for exploring the bay.

Fold-away glass doors connect the villa’s terrace to its interiors, which are filled with an appealing mix of modern pieces and Jamaican antiques for a feel of eclectic luxury. Built-in bookcases lend a sense of elegance to the living room, while in the kitchen, an island layout encourages mingling. A formal indoor dining area has seating for eight.

Each of the villa’s four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and water views. There are two suites with king beds, including a master bedroom, one bedroom with a queen bed, and one bedroom with two twin beds.

At Afimi, the sparkling waters and sugary sands that make Jamaica such a popular destination for warm-weather getaways and honeymoons are at your doorstep. But there’s plenty more to see and do in the neighborhood. It’s less than a 5-minute drive to the uniquely charming Houseboat restaurant and the Montego Bay Yacht Club, and there are three golf courses within easy reach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tucked between the Caribbean Sea and the jungle, on the verge of picturesque Tankah Bay and tranquil Soliman Bay, is Villa Sofia. This spectacular oceanfront home is one of the newest in the area—just outside Tulum—and features six bedrooms, including one in a casita. The combination of gorgeous location and spacious accommodations makes this vacation rental perfect for a getaway with friends or a relaxed holiday with extended family.

The villa’s beachfront living areas feel like your very own luxury resort. Sip refreshments in the shaded sitting areas, go for a swim in the infinity pool, stretch out in the sun on a lounger or perch on one of the swings. As the sun sets, gather under the palapa for a meal at the al-fresco dining table or step inside to unwind around the satellite TV and share photos via Wi-Fi.

Spread out over 6,000 square feet, the interiors of Villa Sofia are spacious and bright. At the heart is an L-shaped great room with living and dining areas that open to the terrace and a kitchen with a breakfast bar. Polished tile floors are cool underfoot, cream-colored furniture is paired with wood accents for a sophisticated look, and two sets of sliding doors flood the space with Riviera Maya sunshine.

Villa Sofia has five bedrooms in its main house—four with king beds and one with two twin beds—and one bedroom in a casita. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and the same refined mix of neutral tones and warm wood accents, and many have private terraces with ocean views. With a king bed, sofa bed and kitchenette, the casita could be used as a honeymoon suite or a retreat for the in-laws.

While you could spend your stay watching the waves crash on the beach in front of the villa or strolling on the sand, it’s well worth leaving this dreamy property to explore the area. Make the 20-minute drive to Tulum to see the unforgettable Mayan ruins, the 50-minute drive to Playa del Carmen for sun and shopping, or the 55-minute drive to Coba for more incredible archaeological sites.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
A haven of contemporary style awaits in the wilds of Costa Rica at Villa Monoi. This brand-new luxury vacation rental is tucked into a gated community just steps from Playa Tamarindo and Playa Langosta via private beach access. Reserve its four bedrooms for a tropical escape with friends or warm-weather getaway with family.

Spend sunny days relaxing by the villa’s pool, reading in the sun loungers or playing at the beach, after which you can stow gear in the secure storage area. Finish with dinner from the barbecue or a chilled-out evening by the TV, Sonos sound system, Wi-Fi and wine cooler.

A fold-away glass wall is all that separates the villa’s open-concept great room from the terrace, giving the interiors a bright, airy feel. Natural textures and sculptural furnishings—think live-edge coffee tables, woven loveseats and low-profile stools—lend a casual yet chic feel in the sitting area, dining area and breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Three of the four bedrooms at Villa Monoi have king beds and views of the pool and garden. The fourth bedroom, with its two twin bunk beds and alfresco shower, is great for families on holiday with younger kids. All four bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans.

Though it started as a surf town, the Tamarindo area has grown into a great beach destination for all ages. Try surfing on the nearby beaches or just play in the turquoise waters, take a day trip to the pristine Marino Las Baulas National Park, enjoy activities from hiking to golfing, and end the day with a honeymoon-worthy dinner at an oceanfront restaurant or a lively night out in one of the town’s bars and clubs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Construction Note: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Let waves lapping at your private beach serve as soundtrack to a blissful holiday at Villa Zacil Na. A wonderful location, attentive staff and thoughtful amenities at this Riviera Maya vacation rental mean that all you need to do is show up and relax. Of course, you can also reserve the property’s sister villa to host a family reunion, anniversary celebration or milestone birthday party for up to eighteen guests.

Your stay at Zacil Na includes the services of a chef for three meals each day, villa manager, butler and housekeeper. With a heated infinity pool, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and even an outdoor sound system, the villa is as well appointed as any resort. There’s also a television, sound system and Wi-Fi inside the house.

Wide sliding glass doors lead from the outdoor living areas to an atrium-like great room with a water feature, double-height ceiling and built-in sofas. It’s sleek and stylish but inviting, with plenty of space to stretch out. You can also gather in the dining room or cook beyond the provided chef service in a fully equipped kitchen.

There are three bedrooms in the main house of this luxury property: two with king beds and one with two twin beds. The villa also has a separate guest house with two king bedrooms, including a honeymoon-worthy suite with its own entrance. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

It’s easy to explore the bay just in front of Villa Zacil Na thanks to provided snorkeling equipment, kayaks and flotation devices. It’s also easy to explore the area; the villa’s Puerto Aventuras location is only a 2-minute drive from the nearest town and golf course, and a 12-minute drive from the restaurants and nightlife of Playa del Carmen.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Ten minutes up the coast from Tulum, you’ll find the white sand and crystal clear waters of Tankah Beach. And, right on Tankah Beach, you’ll find Villa Amara. This five bedroom luxury rental is perfect for a family vacation. With the beach, the ocean, and the beautiful Caribbean sunrise just steps away from your living room couch, you simply can’t go wrong with Villa Amara.

Designed to embrace its natural surroundings, this vacation rental has a relaxing space to suit every mood. Whether your dining on the terrace, having a morning coffee at the breakfast bar, or lounging on the rooftop patio, the ocean view is right there with you. The main floor open concept kitchen/lounge area features large doorways on its front and back walls, ensuring the free flow of fresh ocean breeze. Decorated with custom designed seating, contemporary lighting, and modern high end appliances, it’s easy to appreciate the sophisticated simplicity of Amara’s main floor. Rich wooden accents in the kitchen, a trend that will continue in the five luxurious bedrooms, add a touch of warmth to the ocean inspired atmosphere. And, all of those bedrooms feature king sized beds and en-suite bathrooms.

Some of Amara’s other features inside include, television, a sound system, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and formal dining for ten. On the terrace there are both covered and open living areas with sun loungers, all surrounding the refreshing swimming pool. Before you head to the private beachfront, grab the supplied snorkelling equipment and do some underwater exploration. At meal time, have no worries, this villa comes with three prepared meals and housekeeping everyday.

All within a twenty minute drive of Amara’s beachfront property, you’ll find tennis, golf, historical sights, natural wonders, and the restaurants and shops of Tulum. A great, and close, place to start your sight seeing is Casa Cenote. A deep cave that starts just before Tankah Beach and emerges twenty yards off the beach, in the ocean, as an ‘underwater’ water spring. It’s an amazing natural phenomenon.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Besame is an exquisite luxury home in the renowned Pedregal enclave of Los Cabos, just a short walk from a private beach and minutes from the heart of Cabo San Lucas. Perched at the southernmost tip of Baja, the villa commands panoramic ocean views where the Gulf of California meets the vast Pacific. Fabulous outdoor amenities (including a 70-foot infinity lap pool and a rooftop splash pool) invite you to savor the open-air lifestyle of this seaside paradise, while luminous interiors offer an enchanting venue for dinner parties or intimate gatherings. Four spacious bedroom suites offer superb accommodations for multiple couples, families, and destination wedding guests.

The villa's vibrant white surfaces and elegant lines contrast beautifully with the lush hillside, vibrant gardens, and dreamy hues of the sea and sky. A marble terrace yields to an alluring saltwater pool with adjoining spa and lovely water features, while the breezy, shaded dining area includes a well-appointed outdoor kitchen and a gas fireplace for cooler evenings. The poolside lounge invites you to sip delicious cocktails while marveling at the sublime sunset.

Plentiful windows and sliding glass doors infuse the interiors with natural light and sea-fresh breezes. The main living area features a comfortable salon, gourmet kitchen, and dining table opening to the terrace and pool. Tastefully curated artwork and discretely placed stainless steel appliances lend a chic contemporary edge to the ethereal space. Central air conditioning keeps the ambiance cool when needed.

The bedrooms are furnished with a harmonious minimalism, emphasizing the natural splendor of your surroundings. There are three suites with king beds and one with a queen bed, and all enjoy ensuite bathrooms. The master bathroom includes a retractable roof above the shower and a lovely soaking tub beneath a bloom-like chandelier. Three of the bedrooms enjoy ocean-view balconies, while the fourth opens to the pool and lawn. The villa also includes a library/study with ocean views.

There is hardly a finer location in Los Cabos for enjoying exquisite privacy within easy reach of its world-class beaches and legendary nightlife. You can walk to the beach at Pedgregal or drive a few minutes into Cabo San Lucas. Several golf courses are close by, and Playa Medano is about fifteen minutes away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A location close to the number-one beach in the world, eight hours of butler service each day and four suite-style bedrooms: it all adds up to a gorgeous luxury holiday at Turquoise Villa. This beautiful Leeward vacation rental is perfect for parties of up to eight, whether you’re visiting Turks and Caicos for a warm-weather family getaway or a Caribbean escape with a group of friends.

Your stay at Turquoise Villa includes housekeeping and butler service for eight hours per day, as well as the assistance of a property manager and on-call concierge. Spend your time soaking in the tropical sun from the loungers on the terrace that stretches around the pool and hot tub or seeking shade in the partially covered outdoor sitting area. Prepare dinner on the barbecue to enjoy at the al-fresco dining area, then finish the evening around the firepit or inside in front of the smart TV.

Inside, the villa lives up to its name with chic, open-plan interiors furnished in white with turquoise accents. The living and dining room is flooded with light from a wall of windows and doors opening to the terrace, and the fully equipped kitchen is just as sleek and airy. Set the mood in this contemporary space with the sound system, or post photos of your trip via the home’s Wi-Fi.

The property has two bedrooms with king beds, including a master suite with a furnished private balcony, one bedroom with a queen bed and twin bunk bed, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

A Leeward location means Turquoise Villa is only 150 feet from the top-ranked white sands and clear waters of Grace Bay Beach. Join the honeymooners and sun-seekers on the shore, or make the short drive to the shops and restaurants along the beach or the pristine Princess Alexandra National Park. Practice your swing at the nearby Provo Golf Club and Tennis Court, or book a fishing excursion from Blue Haven Marina.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Red rocks stretch behind and the brilliant blue sea spreads out in front of Casa Escarpa. From the villa’s setting in The Corridor of Los Cabos, you’ll enjoy panoramic views, plus a location close to several beaches, golf and more. Spacious indoor and outdoor areas and three bedrooms make this Cabo Colorado vacation rental perfect for a small family, a group of friends or even a sun-drenched Mexico honeymoon.

The villa feels like your own private luxury resort, with an infinity pool facing the Sea of Cortez, a hot tub, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and a firepit. After sunset, play a few games inside on the ping-pong table, unwind with the help of the TV and sound system, or post a few snaps of your holiday via Wi-Fi.

Step from the terrace through fold-away glass doors and into rooms with classic Cabo appeal, from the free-flowing layout to the generous use of serene natural tones. A comfortable sitting area around the TV, dining table for eight and a breakfast area in the fully equipped kitchen provide ample room to stretch out.

Casa Escarpa has one master suite with a king bed and its own balcony, as well as two bedrooms with queen beds and views of the Sea of Cortez. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans.

The casa is just a short drive from the beaches of Costa Azul, Chileno and Santa Maria Bay, as well as the Cabo Del Sol golf course. Take a day trip to famous Lovers Beach (or a boat trip to Divorce Beach), then follow up with an evening out in lively Cabo San Lucas. Or take a gallery walk around romantic San Jose del Cabo, followed by a multi-course dinner at one of the town’s charming restaurants.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A postcard-worthy panorama of white sand and turquoise water is only one of Alta Vista’s many charms. This idyllic Playa del Carmen vacation rental offers captivating Caribbean Sea views, chic and spacious living areas, and a great location only minutes from the beach and the lively La Quinta neighborhood. Bring up to sixteen friends or family members for a memorable holiday in the Riviera Maya.

There’s plenty of sunshine to soak up on Alta Vista’s two private outdoor living and dining areas: one in the lower-level courtyard and one on the rooftop terrace, which also features a plunge pool. Switch on the sound system for entertainment and linger outside for a little stargazing or finish the evening indoors around the pool table or Apple TV.

The villa’s central great room is large enough for everyone to gather and enjoy the luxury of being together. Polished tile floors are cool underfoot, while stone columns separate the open-concept sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. Woven chairs, natural-fiber rugs and sculptural accent pieces add interest amid the modern furnishings.

The eight bedrooms at Alta Vista have a variety of accommodations, but all have en-suite bathrooms. Relive your honeymoon in one of the four bedrooms with king beds, sleep with children nearby in one of two bedrooms with two queen beds, or let kids have their own space in the two bedrooms with two full beds each.

From the villa’s terraces, it seems like the sandy beach and warm turquoise water are at your doorstep, and indeed, Playacar Beach is only a 1-minute walk away. For shopping and dining or a night out, head to La Quinta (Fifth Avenue), a 12-minute walk from Alta Vista, or make the 10-minute drive into central Playa del Carmen. Golf devotees can choose between the Hard Rock course, 5 minutes away, and the El Camaleon course at Mayakoba, 25 minutes away.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
Adults and children alike will get a kick out of Villa Equinox. Perched on the coast of Sea Breeze Hills in Cap Estate, the villa has breathtaking ocean views as well as two pools and even a swim-up bar. Four suite-style bedrooms, spacious living areas with Caribbean flair, and cook service ensure you’ll stay in privacy and luxury.

Start your day at Villa Equinox with breakfast on the veranda, then move to the adjacent sitting area, a lounge chair on the lawn, or one of several chaises on the pool terrace. The villa’s main pool has a freeform shape crossed by a bridge, a swim-up bar and views of the ocean just below. There’s also a more private plunge pool off the master suite. Prepare dinner on the barbecue, and in the evenings, gather around the television or browse the Internet for entertainment. With cook and housekeeping services included in your stay, all you have to do is relax.

The villa is laid out around a long, airy living and dining room with vaulted ceilings, creamy stone floors and several pairs of French doors opening to the veranda. The living room’s wood-framed sofas have neutral-toned upholstery accented by palm-print pillows, and in the dining room, the same pairing of wood and beige upholstery has traditional Caribbean elegance. The fully equipped kitchen is all modern charm with pale wood cabinets and charcoal gray stone countertops.

Each of the four bedrooms at Villa Equinox has an en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. There are two bedrooms with king beds, one of which has access to a private plunge pool, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. As in the rest of the house, neutral walls and floors and dark wood furniture are set off by brightly colored bedding for a traditionally tropical feel.

It wouldn’t be a vacation on St-Lucia without a day at the beach, so take time to explore the many nearby beaches only a short drive away. Reserve a tee time at Championship Golf Course, a 3.5 km drive from the villa, and discover local fare in the towns of Gros Islet, just over 5.5 km away, and Rodney Bay, 6.5 km away. From Villa Equinox, it’s about a 16 km drive to the island’s George F.L. Charles Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
For those in the know, Papagayo is synonymous with paradise. The natural environment around this magical area of Costa Rica provides ample opportunities to gaze at beautiful butterflies, monkeys, iguanas and colorful foliage. Within this idyllic setting, you will find El Alma, a stunning modern luxury vacation rental that offers breathtaking views of the hillside down to the beach and oceanfront.

This private villa features an outstanding infinity swimming pool with an adjacent viewing deck equipped with sun beds and a parasol. The grounds at El Alma also feature a plunge pool and an alfresco dining area for eight. Indoor perks include an ice maker, Wi-Fi, air conditioning and ceiling fans.

The interiors of El Alma feature sleek contemporary furnishings and a decorative scheme that conjures a Zen-like sense of tranquility. Somewhere between illusion and artwork, the wooden spiral staircase represents a pièce de résistance. High ceilings and sliding floor-to-ceiling windows keep the feelings airy and breezy throughout this architectural gem.

Three immaculate bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to six guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the suites provide air conditioning, ceiling fans and access to a balcony or terrace with dazzling ocean views. With comfortable bedding and only the finest linens and accoutrements, you will be sleeping in style! We recommend El Alma for a family holiday, a decadent honeymoon or an unforgettable wedding.

One of the fairways of the wonderful 18-hole, par-72 golf course designed by Arnold Palmer is within view of the villa and is just a short walk to the clubhouse. Surfers should be sure to check out Witches Rock, one of the most popular beaches to ‘hang ten’ in the world. Nearby Playa Grande is also well known for surfing and being a nesting ground for leatherback turtles. The calm cove of Playa del Coco is ideal for children and beginner swimmers. For the more adventurous, many of Papagayo’s secluded beaches can be reached by canoe or sea kayak. With sparkling sands dancing with hermit crabs and monkeys calling out as you sunbathe, don’t forget to make time to catch one of those unforgettable Costa Rican sunsets!

Read more about this villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/el-alma-villa-in-costa-rica/)

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Walk past a row of swaying palm trees to reach the front door of this cubic villa. Shades of blue move throughout, in the form of plump couches, accent rugs, and abstract artwork, like the gently rolling waves of the Atlantic Ocean. Walk mere minutes to reach snorkeling adventures (think: sea turtles, lobsters, a rainbow of tropical fish) in Smith’s Reef or guided boat tours in Turtle Cove Marina.

Sliding glass doors open the full length of the living room, expanding out to the secluded stretch of Babalua Beach, where you can dive in and be apart of the vivid underwater life. Set into the sugar-white sand, the heated infinity pool imitates the colour of the ocean, melting into the far-reaching vista beyond. Soaking up rays is effortless on the outdoor loungers, perhaps with a martini in hand and music in the air. Seek solace from the sun under the open air pergola, allowing yourself the comfort of the shade while inhaling the intoxicating scent of the sea. 

Soft ivory sand and crystal clear waters at Grace Bay Beach are 10 minutes away by car. Tee off at Provo Golf Club, explore a string of sleepy cays at Leeward, or mingle with the locals at The Bight Park’s Fish Fry. Back at the Sandcastle, your crew can enjoy happy hour or a starlit, alfresco dinner on the terrace.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this property is next to a halted construction project, please inquire with one of our Villa Specialists for details.

This stunning waterfront villa is situated on Montego Bay along the northwest shore of Jamaica. Ideal for special occasions or serene escapes, the two-story home features breathtaking sea views and expansive outdoor living areas on both levels. Its resort-style pool terrace borders a lovely beach suitable for watersports and alfresco dining. Five comfortable bedrooms (four with king beds, one with a pair of twin beds) offer ideal accommodations for families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to ten in size. Your vacation rental includes the services of a talented private staff, including a butler and chef.

Nestled amid lush gardens and palm trees, the villa evokes the ambiance of a secluded sanctuary bathed in Caribbean light. Step into the pool's refreshing waters as you gaze at the beautiful views. Sunbathe on semi-submerged loungers perched on the Baja shelf, relaxing to the sounds of the waterfall behind you. Take the villa's kayaks and paddleboards onto the turquoise bay, and return to delicious drinks from the bar. Dine alfresco on the beach or veranda, and linger outdoors deep into the night, sipping classic cocktails in the dreamy breeze.

The interiors offer a cool, spacious retreat for relaxing afternoons and laid-back evenings. The open-concept space features a fully equipped gourmet kitchen, a dining table for ten, and a breakfast niche. There is also an office space for business travelers, as well as a comfortable media room with large TV.

The exceptional master suite features a king bed, walk-in closet, deluxe ensuite bathroom, and expansive private balcony with covered lounge seating and panoramic sea views. There are three king guestrooms with walk-in closets and private, furnished verandas—two enjoy ensuite bathrooms, while the other has access to a hallway bathrooms and alfresco shower. The other guestroom has two twin beds, a walk-in closet, and an ensuite bathroom. All of the rooms include safes, air conditioning, and ceiling fans.

Everything Nice is wonderfully located for guests of all ages, within easy reach of Aqua Sol Theme Park, Royal Decameron Montego Beach, Montego Bay Cruise Port, and Half Moon Resort and Golf Course. Complimentary transfer is provided to and from Sangster International Airport, just seven kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

In the 1950s, Jamaican attorney Clinton Hart happened onto this remarkable three-acre oceanfront location and built a simple beach cottage for his family. Since then, Canoe Cove has been a virtually unembellished and beloved family home for generations. Recently, Hart’s grandson replaced the worn cottage with new architecture and contemporary finishing. Straightforward, uncomplicated and loaded with thoughtful comforts, this Ocho Rios bijou redefines luxury in a beachy, barefoot lifestyle!

You will hardly know where to begin your holiday. A splash in the Junior Olympic swimming pool or a soothing soak in the hot tub? Keep the good times rolling with some alfresco dining while the private chef makes the barbeque sizzle. Meanwhile, the consummate entertainers will surely find themselves mixing drinks at the outdoor wet bar. From an alfresco shower, to sun loungers, an oversized sandbox and a putting green, Canoe Cove has got you covered. Take the paddle boards and kayaks out to sea, have a rally at the tennis court or shoot some hoops – the options are virtually endless!

This vacation rental is stylish without pretense or overstatement. Textures of exotic woods establish a grounded, organic ambience as a backdrop against stylish furnishings. Cedar, Jojoba, Honduran pine, marble, coral stone and natural cement floors are so cool under bare feet. Finishes of reclaimed teak and driftwood echo the landscape of the Caribbean. Decorating a hallway is a whimsical six foot pendant lamp made entirely of old magazines. Across the lawn, the supporting structures of the gazebo are purloined telephone poles with bamboo bases. Delicate orchids adorn most rooms and are cultivated on-site.

Seven exquisite bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to fourteen guests at this non-smoking villa. All of the suites offer king size beds, except for one with two doubles. Perks include rain showers and access to a terrace or balcony. Canoe Cove makes a great bet for a large family holiday or a special event such as a wedding.

During your stay in this enchanting part of Jamaica, the nearby outdoor museum Columbus Park offers the opportunity to learn about the Spanish Colonial era through the artifacts on display. Perhaps you will take a boat trip or visit the friendly inhabitants of Dolphin Cove. However you choose to spend your time, you will cherish the familiar feelings of coming back to Canoe Cove!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Indulge in a luxury stay with eco-friendly cred at Villa Tropical. This Costa Rica vacation rental is stylishly appointed and sustainably designed, with contemporary open-plan rooms and features like solar-powered water heaters. Its location in the exclusive Mar Vista community puts you close to both the quiet white-sand beaches of Playa Flamingo and the lively surf scene in Tamarindo.

Villa Tropical is set on three lush private acres with mountain and ocean views. The house is laid out around an expansive terrace with a infinity pool, plenty of chaise longues, an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue, and shaded sitting and dining areas. There’s space for the whole family to play games on the lawn or the half basketball court.

The interiors of Villa Tropical are designed to allow cooling cross breezes to waft through the living spaces, lit by energy-saving LED bulbs and served by solar-heated water that’s then recycled for use in the gardens. But that doesn’t mean they sacrifice style or comfort. The heart of the home is a beautiful open-plan great room with a living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen that can be opened to the terrace via sliding glass walls. Details like mod lounge chairs, natural-fiber rugs and stunning waterfall countertops feel both chic and inviting.

There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house, and one in a guest house that could be used as a honeymoon or in-law suite. In the main house, you’ll find a master suite with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and ocean views, and two bedrooms that share a bath: one with a queen bed, the other with two twin beds. The guest-house suite features a king bed, en-suite bathroom, al-fresco shower and views stretching out over the pool, mountains and Pacific.

Designed as a sustainable community for families, retirees and everyone in between, Mar Vista is perfect for a holiday close to great golf, snorkeling, diving, fishing, stand-up paddleboarding and hiking trails. Villa Tropical is a 1-minute walk from the community clubhouse and a 3-mile drive or less from three different beaches. To see more of Costa Rica or enjoy a memorable night out, make the short drive to Tamarindo and sample its shopping, dining and entertainment.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Silent Waters is a spectacular villa at Montego Bay along the northwest shore of Jamaica. With its private heli-pad and ample space for cocktail or dinner parties, the villa forms an enchanting venue for special occasions; while resort-like features including a tennis court and fabulous pool make it a choice haven for family reunions. The villa's staff will enhance your experience with their warmth and professionalism (not to mention extraordinary home-made drinks and meals). To top it off, guests at Silent Waters enjoy access to the Tryall Club, named by Condé Nast as one of the finest luxury destinations in the world.

An Asian-influenced ambiance distinguishes Silent Waters, with its dreamy koi pond, beautiful gardens, and harmonious design emerging gracefully from the exquisite landscape. The infinite pool overlooks panoramic ocean views and includes a lovely stepping stone path to the sunken patio. The poolside dining pavilion and bar offer enchanting havens for alfresco meals and cocktails in the Caribbean breeze.

Bordering the pool, the villa's semi-open-air great room features vaulted ceilings, a lovely lounge, and a stunning dining table for large feasts. Broad thresholds open to the terrace, inhaling the ocean air and framing majestic vistas. Numerous salons and lounge areas are distributed throughout the villa, inviting you to savor cocktails by the piano or cuddle up with a favorite movie. Baby-friendly features and a fitness room round out the villa's family-oriented offerings.

The eight well-appointed bedrooms feature various bedding arrangements to accommodate guests of all ages. The stunning Owner's Villa suite features a king bed, an ensuite bathroom, a living and dining area, and a private terrace with free-form pool and panoramic views. Each of the guest suites offers a unique ambiance and beautiful prospects of the sea or forest. Air conditioning ensures comfort in all seasons.

Silent Waters is about a fifteen minute drive to Tryall Club, a world-renowned resort with 2,200 acres of spectacular oceanfront grounds. Top-grade offerings include pro-level tennis courts, an 18-hole championship golf, myriad watersports, a white-sand beach with waterfront café, and a fabulous restaurant in the vintage 19th-century Great House. Proximity to Sangster International Airport ensures easy access for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Silent Waters welcomes the opportunity to host your special event. Whether you are planning an intimate sit-down dinner for 20 guests, a buffet dinner for 54 guests or an elegant cocktail party for 150 or more guests, our staff will assist you every step of the way. Silent Waters is the ideal venue to hold the perfect wedding, reunion, birthday party, anniversary or other memorable occasion. Please contact us for more information.

Guests may choose the villa’s prepaid gourmet meal plan or the grocery option. With the prepaid meal plan, the villa chef will prepare breakfast, lunch, pre-dinner hors d’oeuvres and dinner based on the villa’s elegant gourmet menus. The cost is $115 per adult per day and children aged 3 to 12 is $57.50 per child per day (rates are excluding 10% GCT). In lieu of lunch at the villa, boxed lunches can be provided for day trips. If choosing the grocery option, plan to pay for groceries locally in cash. A typical grocery budget is about $100-$110 per adult per day and young children about $45-$55 per child per day depending upon the type of menus selected. Shrimp, lobster and imported meats or large quantities of other food items will increase the budget (lobster is out of season April 1 – June 30 and, therefore, is unavailable during that period). Note that if choosing the grocery option, a fee of $12.50 per person per day will be charged for food acquisition and preparation. A pre-payment of $1,500 will also be required for pre-stocking of groceries for the first 1-1/2 days. With either option, the villa staff will work with you to determine the types of delicious meals you would like during your stay, as well as discuss any allergies and/or special dietary needs.

ul.li: _ Please note _ that all beverages (alcoholic and non-alcoholic) must be purchased from Silent Waters' liquor, wine and beverage inventory (guests may not bring in their own liquor / beverages). All beverages (and fresh fruit used at the bar) are charged separately and billed at the end of the stay. Additional charges apply for cocktail parties and other guest-hosted events.

listing.listing_description:
This spectacular beachfront villa is situated in the Conchas Chinas neighborhood just south of Puerto Vallarta. Built in a classic hacienda style with rose-colored facades and exquisite décor, the villa offers a unique yet quintessential experience of coastal Mexico. Five deluxe bedrooms suites accommodate up to ten guests, and the vacation rental includes a cook, butler, and housekeeping.

Panoramic ocean views inspire almost every space in the home, while gracefully fused interiors and terraces invite you to dine, relax, and entertain in the sea-kissed breeze. Bathe in the refreshing waters of the infinite swimming bordering the dining room, and bask in the Pacific sun on loungers oriented toward the vast horizon. Relish your meals alfresco on the balcony, and linger to admire the sunset tableau.

Wide thresholds lend an enchanting, open-air quality to the villa's cool interiors. Beautiful brick cupolas grace the dining and living rooms, conjuring an Old Mexico ambiance for memorable feasts and intimate gatherings. The fully equipped kitchen includes high-grade contemporary appliances along with exquisite rustic elements, such as the vaulted, wood-beamed ceiling and tile backsplash. Fine artwork and furnishings evoke the country's colonial, indigenous, and modernist traditions.

Villa Marea Alta features four ocean-view bedroom suites with private terraces—three with king beds, one with a double bed—as well as a fifth room in a separate "casita" with king bed and twin daybed. All have ensuite bathrooms (the master's includes a superb tub) along with air conditioning, ceiling fans, safes, and televisions, providing dreamy havens for afternoon siestas and tranquil nights.

Conchas Chinas is known as the Beverly Hills of Puerto Vallarta, with its fabulous blend of luxury homes, world-class beaches, and nearby nightlife. You're about eight hundred paces from Conchas Chinas Beach and within a short drive of the famed Playa Los Muertos. The Malecon esplanade of Puerto Vallarta is just three kilometers away. Golfers will enjoy several outstanding courses nearby, and watersport enthusiasts will find abundant opportunities along the coast of Jalisco. Proximity to the international airport makes Villa Marea Alta an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Catch the wind from your kite-board off Long Bay Beach, hunt for conch shells in the crystalline water, and stroll home barefoot to your private haven on Providenciales. Situated on the island's eastern shore, this contemporary cottage is just 500 paces from the beach and features panoramic ocean views from its upper balcony. Drive to Grace Bay in the villa's complimentary SUV or keep it simple with a poolside barbecue at sunset.

The home is nestled on a gated property amid lush coastal flora, with a private swimming pool running 3 to 6 feet deep. Enjoy long hours sipping drinks under parasols, or curling up with a favorite book in the hammock or pod chair. Cook fresh fish on the grill in the evening light, and relish your meal alfresco on the balcony.

The interior offers a cool sanctuary for afternoon downtime or festive nights. An open-concept layout includes a TV lounge, reading nook, 4-person dining table, and fully equipped kitchen. Air conditioning and contemporary conveniences including Wi-Fi and a washer/dryer create a comfortable home base between island adventures.

The master suite opens to a private, ocean-view balcony and features a king bed, walk-in closet, and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity and shower. The guest suite, essentially a second master, opens to a wrap-around balcony with hammock. There is also a double-size sofa bed in the living room—perfect for kids or an extra guest.

Located on the windward shore of Providenciales, Long Bay Beach is famous worldwide for its kite-boarding conditions, while its generally shallow waters can be ideal for swimming. The famous sands and restaurants of Grace Bay are just 3 kilometers away, and you're about 4 kilometers from Provo Golf Club.

listing.listing_description:
This exquisite Costa Rican villa enjoys a beachfront location at Santa Teresa cove, just steps from the Florblanca hotel and minutes from Playa Hermosa. Nestled amid lush tropical trees and flowers yielding to Pacific ocean vistas, the villa offers ample alfresco living space for dining and relaxation, elegant and spacious interiors with beautiful rustic accents, and three bedroom suites accommodating six guests.

The arcaded veranda of white stone overlooks a rich blue swimming pool that leads your gaze toward the Pacific expanse. Enjoy enchanting days in the ocean breeze while sunbathing on elegant loungers and relaxing in the delicious pool. Stroll along your private stretch of beach and plunge into the crystalline water before returning to afternoon barbeques and alfresco meals.

Wide sets of doors open between the veranda and the villa's interior, allowing the home to breathe the ocean air. The seamless indoor/outdoor space provides a lovely setting for cocktail parties with guests or serene evenings with loved-ones. Enjoy home cooking in the gourmet kitchen and delectable feasts of local fare at the dining table. Ample glass doors and clerestory windows invite exquisite light into the home, while wood furnishings add a soothing, rustic earthiness to the luminous space.

There are two king bedroom suites and one with two twin beds. All three enjoy ensuite bathrooms, and the king suites both have alfresco showers. The master suite features a furnished balcony and garden views, while the primary guest suite has a king bed and lounge area. The twin bedroom has its own kitchenette and opens to a furnished balcony—a great private sanctuary for kids. Serene minimalism with rustic touches provides an exquisite ambiance for siestas and peaceful nights.

Perched along the shore where Playa Santa Teresa meets Playa Cocal, Maison Marazul enjoys a fabulous location for relishing the natural beauty and pura vida lifestyle of the Guanacasta province and Costa Rica. Up and down the coastline you'll discover wonderful restaurants, wellness retreats, and beaches with distinct characters. Beside you, Florblanca offers world-class resort amenities just a short walk away, including wellness facilities, yoga, and dining.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Casa Lieber is located in a privileged spot a few steps from the Sea of Cortez shore within the high-end section of Fundadores in the Puerto Los Cabos development. Surround by magnificent and lush gardens, you’ll tend to forget that you are surrounded by the desert. One of the most talented architects in the area designed this boutique villa, filling the residence with characteristic eclectic details and Spanish architectural elements.

There is no doubt that this luxury residence is all about large open spaces. The main terrace, BBQ, deck and swimming pool are the special touches that will make your stay at Casa Lieber truly unforgettable. Enjoy all the amenities of home at Casa Lieber including television, DVD player, surround sound system, Wi-Fi, air conditioning and laundry facility. With an on-site security guard and daily housekeeping, your villa will be safe and immaculate every day of the week.

Drink in style at the bar while enjoying your high tech media room, or relax in the generous family room by an arcade verandah transporting you all the way to Andalucía. Arched beams and colonial-style furniture decorate your abode, creating a space you can bask in. Gorgeous mahogany cabinets and marble countertops adorn the kitchen, leaving only room for excellence and culinary mastery.

Two spacious master bedrooms and two guest suites are strategically situated for total independence in order to provide privacy to their occupants. With a total of four bedrooms, Casa Lieber can accommodate up to eight guests, and is perfect for families and diverse groups. Each bedroom includes a king or queen sized bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, satellite television and an ocean or garden view terrace.

Cabo San Lucas is the leader in the retreat scene in Mexico. With an incredible array of first-class resorts, world-renowned fishing, a plethora of activities and a broad range of dining and entertainment venues, Can San Lucas has much to offer. The design and decor at Casa Lieber represents a marriage of classical Mexican-colonial design and sleek, modern amenities. Whether you have come for golf, water sports or a sultry nightlife, you will find it here. Come and frolic in the glorious Mexican sunshine and enjoy the vacation you deserve!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled along the white sands of Taylor Bay Beach in Providenciales Villa Sorrento is the ideal vacation rental for honeymoons and romantic getaways. The beautiful, one-bedroom residence—part of a private complex of three spectacular luxury villas—features dreamy indoor and outdoor living areas, spectacular views of the Caribbean Sea, and one of the finest locations in Turks and Caicos.

Enjoy heavenly days and evenings on your secluded stretch of beach, diving into the turquoise waters of the ocean, playing your favorite watersports, and gazing out at the heavenly horizon. Return to your villa's private terrace and plunge into the delicious swimming pool before savoring the Caribbean sun on elegant loungers as you sip fine Champagne. Fire up the grill for a lavish seafood barbeque and share a memorable meal at the alfresco table, illuminated by lovely lighting.

The villa's living room opens directly to the terrace through wide glass doors, imbuing the interior with a wonderful plein-air feel. The light-filled and fully equipped kitchen is the perfect setting for mixing drinks and cooking wonderful feasts, which you'll savor at the elegant dining table. The sumptuous lounge is the ideal setting for evenings together. The villa's interior décor is exquisite and tasteful throughout, with fine artwork and beautiful touches of ocean color that capture and enhance the island's precious natural beauty.

On the upper floor, the master bedroom suite is perfectly designed for enjoying the spectacular ocean views—whether from the sumptuous king size bed, the furnished balcony, or the ensuite bathroom joined to the bedroom by an open wall. Relish peaceful nights of sleep to the ocean's rhythm. Sip your morning coffee as you gaze upon the pool, shoreline, and sea. Bathe in the stand-alone tub and refresh yourself in the stand-alone shower.

At Villa Sorrento, you'll enjoy not only direct beach access but shared access to the complex's private tennis court. And beyond your villa, you'll enjoy wonderful proximity to the shops and nightlife of Providenciales, the world-class golf of Provo Golf and Country Club, the famous Grace Bay, and the precious natural treasures of Princess Alexandra National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Miramar is located in the heart of Tulum’s famous Caribbean coast, one and a half miles south of the historic Mayan ruins. The point at which the surf breaks directly in front of the grand palapa room offers the best snorkeling in Tulum. Sit in the cool water of your private swimming pool and count the rolling ocean waves as they turn from blue to green. It’s all about the sun, the surf and the azure sky at this contemporary oceanfront beach house.

The breezy, sun-drenched palapa creates the perfect atmosphere for quiet contemplation, romance or entertaining friends, family or business associates. Enjoy oceanfront views, or take a dip in the swimming pool while entertaining guests with a barbeque cook-off. Your villa provides a cocktail deck, patio with lounge area, alfresco shower, lounge chairs, sound system and iPod dock. Enjoy a dining area for twelve, perfect for any kind of dinner party.

With popping pink accents and rich wooden decor, you’ll feel immersed by this Mexican palace. The deluxe kitchen at Villa Miramar includes a white marble breakfast bar and stainless steal luxury appliances. Create a meal in the most elegant atmosphere. Lounge in the living room in the circular couch and enjoy spectacular ocean views. With the glass doors open, you have a balanced atmosphere of indoor and outdoor living.

With five king bedroom suites, all with private en-suite bathrooms, Villa Miramar can accommodate ten guests in great comfort and style. Enjoy a private palapa and ocean view in the master bedroom. Fine linens and accoutrements provided splendid nights of rest with nothing but the sounds of ocean waves as your soundtrack.

Villa Miramar is a vacation home that will provide you with a treasure trove of memories. Combining the mystery of the ancient civilization which inhabited this zone with the singular beauty of the Caribbean Sea that bathes its shores, this trip to Mexico is sure to be one for the books! Activities are endless including the Mayan Ruins, cenotes, eco parks, snorkeling, scuba diving or swimming with dolphins. Villa Miramar is a peaceful haven and the perfect place to celebrate something special!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled in a grove of 40 lush coconut palms at the end of prestigious Turtle Tail Drive, fully staffed Tip Of The Tail Villa is the definition of contemporary Caribbean luxury living. This gated, private mini resort is a celebrity caliber villa where guests have exclusive access to nearly 500 feet of spectacular oceanfront on 1.1 acres.

Masterfully designed for seamless indoor/outdoor living there is ample room and accommodates 12 comfortably. There are two identical king master suites and three guest suites, each with two queen beds, all bedrooms are outfitted with 1000 thread count Egyptian cotton sheets. Spa-like bathrooms are equipped with Ralph Lauren towels and Molton Brown toiletries

The expansive outdoor living spaces deliver breathtaking views of the turquoise waters from every vantage point. Its nearly impossible to look away from the hypnotic beauty of the Caicos Banks. This is a privileged place where you can smell the salt air, hear the waves and feel the pulse of the sea. The senses come alive at Tip Of The Tail Villa.

With a private chef, housekeeper/butler to pamper you; this is the ideal villa for families, groups of friends and destination wedding guests.

Savor mornings with unobstructed views as the sun rises from the sea. Stretch out on the gigantic sunbed or one of the many loungers. Cool off in the glass walled pool with a refreshing island beverage. Exotic wood decks guide you across sugar white sand to the water’s edge. The dock is your access to the sea at a depth of approximately 7 feet. Meander through the coconut palms to the shallow lagoon. Sparkling like a gem, this is a playground and the gateway to the mangroves. Kayak, paddleboard or snorkel- the equipment is ready for you. Here, turtles, rays and colorful fish are your only neighbors. This is the tropical paradise you have been searching for.

Relax under thatched palapas or a hammock while listening to your favourite music- There are SONOS speakers and wi-fi everywhere. Feeling a little competitive? Tip of the Tail Villa offers a beach volleyball court, a beach bocce ball court, as well as a 3-hole putting green.

SPLASH is probably the island’s coolest private beach bar. This space can open to reveal incredible water views on three sides. Beer taps, billiards, TV, this is the ultimate chill spot. Watch the big game on the screen or as guests play volleyball on the 10,000 square foot beach.

When night falls, head to the enchanting fire pit and gaze up at the stars and into the eyes of your special people as they tell stories of the day’s splendor. The fire pit is just one place where sparks can rekindle.

Tip Of The Tail Villa is a gathering place where memories are made and shared.
